data.lyric:
[ti:Toosie Slide (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Toosie Slide (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Toosie Slide (Explicit) - Drake
[00:03.53]Lyrics by：Aubrey Graham/O. Yildirim
[00:07.06]Composed by：Aubrey Graham/O. Yildirim
[00:10.59]Black leather glove no sequins
[00:13.51]Buckles on the jacket it's Alyx s**t
[00:16.41]Nike crossbody got a piece in it
[00:19.02]Got a dance but it's really on some street s**t
[00:21.84]I'ma show you how to get it
[00:23.37]It go right foot up left foot slide
[00:26.70]Left foot up right foot slide
[00:29.47]Basically I'm sayin' either way we 'bout to slide ayy
[00:32.61]Can't let this one slide ayy
[00:34.68]Don't you want to dance with me
[00:36.49]No I could dance like Michael Jackson
[00:40.25]I could give you thug passion
[00:43.21]It's a thriller in the trap where we from
[00:46.21]Baby don't you want to dance with me
[00:48.36]No I could dance like Michael Jackson
[00:52.12]I could give you satisfaction
[00:55.09]And you know we out here every day with it
[00:57.21]I'ma show you how to get it
[00:58.56]It go right foot up left foot slide
[01:01.91]Left foot up right foot slide
[01:04.72]Basically I'm sayin' either way we 'bout to slide ayy
[01:07.85]Can't let this one slide ayy
[01:09.15]Who's babe
[01:12.26]Two thousand shorties wanna tie the knot ayy yeah
[01:15.15]Two hundred shooters on my brother's block woah yeah
[01:18.07]Petal off the rose like I love her not maybe not
[01:21.07]I don't know what's wrong with me I can't stop woah yeah
[01:24.07]Won't stop woah yeah never stop
[01:26.25]Got so many opps I be mistakin' opps for other opps
[01:29.15]Got so many people that I love out of troubled spots
[01:32.14]Other than the family I got it's either you or me
[01:35.81]That's just how I think it's either you or me
[01:38.75]This life got too deep for you baby
[01:41.59]Two or three of us about to creep where they stayin'
[01:44.56]Black leather glove no sequins
[01:47.60]Buckles on the jacket it's Alyx s**t
[01:50.50]Nike crossbody got a piece in it
[01:53.15]Got a dance but it's really on some street s**t
[01:55.88]I'ma show you how to get it
[01:57.45]It go right foot up left foot slide
[02:00.71]Left foot up right foot slide
[02:03.60]Basically I'm sayin' either way we 'bout to slide ayy
[02:06.76]Can't let this one slide ayy
[02:08.17]Who's babe
[02:11.09]Toosie slide then I hit it double time
[02:13.40]Then I hit a spin 'cause we spun their block a couple times
[02:16.23]If it's not the right time there'll always be another time
[02:19.22]I'm not even trippin' we'll just see 'em in the summertime woah yeah
[02:22.77]Can't describe the pressure I be puttin' on myself yeah
[02:25.82]Really I just can't afford to lose nobody else yeah
[02:28.79]If they movin' shaky we'll just do this s**t ourselves woah
[02:31.60]If I'm movin' shaky Chubbs'll do this s**t himself yeah
[02:34.52]Solo n***as only YOLO for real
[02:37.46]Heard a lot about ya but we don't know for real
[02:40.45]Next time guarantee the truth'll get revealed
[02:43.34]Black leather glove no sequins
[02:45.94]Yeah
[02:46.52]Buckles on the jacket it's Alyx s**t
[02:49.30]Nike crossbody got a piece in it
[02:51.95]Got a dance but it's really on some street s**t
[02:54.91]I'ma show you how
[02:56.29]It go right foot up left foot slide
[02:59.54]Left foot up right foot slide
[03:02.46]Basically I'm sayin' either way we 'bout to slide ayy
[03:05.58]Can't let this one slide ayy
[03:07.76]Don't you want to dance with me
[03:09.45]No I could dance like Michael Jackson
[03:12.33]Jackson
[03:13.23]I could give you thug passion
[03:15.61]Passion
[03:16.45]It's a thriller in the trap where we from
[03:18.56]Where we from
[03:19.11]Baby don't you want to dance with me
[03:21.40]No I could dance like Michael Jackson
[03:24.00]Jackson
[03:25.09]I could give you satisfaction
[03:27.00]'Faction
[03:28.01]And you know we out here every day with it
[03:30.22]I'ma show you how to get it
[03:31.49]It go right foot up left foot slide
[03:34.82]Left foot up right foot slide
[03:37.72]Basically I'm sayin' either way we 'bout to slide
[03:41.95]Who's bae
data.trans:
[ti:Toosie Slide]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Toosie Slide - Single]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.53]//
[00:07.06]//
[00:10.59]黑皮手套 没有亮片
[00:13.51]带扣的夹克 是1017 ALYX 9SM牌的
[00:16.41]耐克斜挎包 里面放着一把枪
[00:19.02]我会一种舞步 但这是街头专属
[00:21.84]我要教教你怎样跳这种舞
[00:23.37]右脚向上提 左脚滑动
[00:26.70]左脚向上提 右脚滑动
[00:29.47]基本上 我是说 不管怎样 我们都要跳舞
[00:32.61]不能让这种乐趣消失
[00:34.68]你不想和我跳舞吗
[00:36.49]我可以像迈克尔·杰克逊一样跳舞
[00:40.25]我可以请你喝点美味的饮料
[00:43.21]这就是我们街头版本的《颤栗》
[00:46.21]宝贝 你不想和我跳舞吗
[00:48.36]我可以像迈克尔·杰克逊一样跳舞
[00:52.12]我保证让你心满意足
[00:55.09]你知道 我们每天都充满激情
[00:57.21]我要教教你怎样跳这种舞
[00:58.56]右脚向上提 左脚滑动
[01:01.91]左脚向上提 右脚滑动
[01:04.72]基本上 我是说 不管怎样 我们都要跳舞
[01:07.85]不能让这种乐趣消失
[01:09.15]谁是我的宝贝
[01:12.26]两千个姑娘都想和我结婚
[01:15.15]两百个杀手在我兄弟的街区
[01:18.07]一片一片摘下玫瑰花瓣 我爱她 还是不爱她
[01:21.07]我不知道我怎么了 我停不下来
[01:24.07]不会停下来 绝不停下来
[01:26.25]我的敌人太多了 常常会把他们给认混
[01:29.15]让很多我爱的人都摆脱了困境
[01:32.14]除了我的家人 你我之间 总要有人做点什么
[01:35.81]我就是这样想的 你我之间 总要有人做点什么
[01:38.75]这种生活对你来说太难对付 宝贝
[01:41.59]我们可能会派两三个人潜入他们所在的地方
[01:44.56]黑皮手套 没有亮片
[01:47.60]带扣的夹克 是1017 ALYX 9SM牌的
[01:50.50]耐克斜挎包 里面放着一把枪
[01:53.15]我会一种舞步 但这是街头专属
[01:55.88]我要教教你怎样跳这种舞
[01:57.45]右脚向上提 左脚滑动
[02:00.71]左脚向上提 右脚滑动
[02:03.60]基本上 我是说 不管怎样 我们都要跳舞
[02:06.76]不能让这种乐趣消失
[02:08.17]谁是我的宝贝
[02:11.09]跳起Toosie Slide 然后加快速度
[02:13.40]然后转一圈 我们已经在他们的地盘转了好几圈
[02:16.23]如果现在时机不对 总有时机恰当的时候
[02:19.22]我没有胡说八道 等到夏天的时候 一切自有分晓
[02:22.77]难以形容我给自己施加了多少压力
[02:25.82]真的 我只是不能再失去任何人了
[02:28.79]如果他们不可靠 那我们就要靠自己
[02:31.60]要是我不可靠 那Chubbs也会自己顾自己
[02:34.52]独来独往的人 你只有一次生命 真的
[02:37.46]听说了很多关于你的事 但我们其实并不了解
[02:40.45]下一次 保证真相大白于世
[02:43.34]黑皮手套 没有亮片
